text: thumb|Ursula Andress in 1974 Ursula Andress (born 19 March 1936) is a Swiss television and movie actress who played the Bond girls in Dr. No and Casino Royale. She also starred in many other movies besides that. Andress was born in Ostermundigen to a Swiss mother and German father. == Other websites == * Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Actresses who played Bond girls Category:Swiss movie actors Category:Swiss television actors Category:People from Bern-Mittelland District
title: Ursula Andress
